data.name: Stella Pastoris
data.detailed_description:
Ancient Terra is a planet of the eternal machine. Flesh is outlawed.
Those who refused to become machines were banished to the void on derelict ships. Merciful saint Stella Pastoris guides them.

After a thousand years, the saint struggles to keep the crumbling vessels and the precious sleep chambers functioning. Damaged by a passing comet's tail, the ship plunges towards the nearest world, a class E planet bathed in radiation from a nearby pulsar.

As the ancient reactors begins to fail, it is inevitable that the sleeping faithful will awaken. They will need food, shelter, and most of all...hope.



  • Recover knowledge from the wreckage of the doomed ships
  • Build the means to supply the needs of the ever growing ranks of faithful, both material and spiritual
  • Face the Void, on Proxima death is certain...or is it?
  • Let your faith sustain you, or embrace science
  • Explore the world to find the scarce resources needed to survive
data.about_the_game:
Ancient Terra is a planet of the eternal machine. Flesh is outlawed.
Those who refused to become machines were banished to the void on derelict ships. Merciful saint Stella Pastoris guides them.

After a thousand years, the saint struggles to keep the crumbling vessels and the precious sleep chambers functioning. Damaged by a passing comet's tail, the ship plunges towards the nearest world, a class E planet bathed in radiation from a nearby pulsar.

As the ancient reactors begins to fail, it is inevitable that the sleeping faithful will awaken. They will need food, shelter, and most of all...hope.



  • Recover knowledge from the wreckage of the doomed ships
  • Build the means to supply the needs of the ever growing ranks of faithful, both material and spiritual

data.short_description: Shepherd the last remnants of the Malthusian monks marooned on Proxima Centauri B. As a mechanical saint, will you delve into forbidden means to save your people or allow them to go quietly into the night? Set up production chains to spend limited resources to save as many as you can.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 7
  • Processor: Intel Core2Duo
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Storage: 75 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM

  • OS: 10.10
  • Processor: Intel Core2Duo
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Storage: 75 MB available space
